about.description: Full Stack Developer with 3 years of experience in designing, developing, and implementing web applications and APIs. Specialized in modern technologies such as React, Node.js, Python, and PHP, with a focus on building scalable, efficient, and user-centered solutions. Experienced in system integration, process optimization, and collaborative work environments under agile methodologies. Seeking to contribute to challenging projects where I can apply my technical skills and continue growing professionally.

skills.description: Here are some of the technologies I work with regularly.

items.description: Design and development of web applications using technologies such as React, Node.js, Python, and PHP. Creation of RESTful APIs for integration with external systems and third-party services. Management of relational databases (MySQL, PostgreSQL) and non-relational databases like MongoDB. Implementation of authentication and authorization systems in secure web environments. Collaboration with multidisciplinary teams under agile methodologies. Recently exploring AI-powered features to enhance user experience and automate decision-making processes.

contact.description: Feel free to reach out for collaborations, freelance opportunities, or just to connect professionally.
